entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Caledon
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:14 PM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Cloudy. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind becoming east 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow mixed with freezing rain. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow or freezing rain at times mixed with ice pellets beginning in the morning. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing drizzle. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 5. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023
